email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are looking to ship 12,000 MT of wheat from Buenos Aires to Rotterdam. Could you provide a freight quote for this shipment? We are aiming for a laycan of November 10-15.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Cargo Transport Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer you the vessel MV GRAIN MASTER, DWT 45,000, LOA 190m, for this shipment. The starting freight rate is USD 35/MT on CFR terms. Laycan November 10-15 is feasible.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Peter Wilson
Maritime Trading Co.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Thank you for the quick response. USD 35/MT seems a bit high compared to the current market rates. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 32/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I understand your concern regarding the rate. I can adjust the freight rate to USD 33/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata.

Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

USD 33/MT and the demurrage rate of USD 10,000/day are acceptable. Please proceed with the booking and send over the contract.

Thank you,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Great! I will send the contract shortly. Here are the confirmed details:

Commodity: Wheat
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Buenos Aires
Discharge Port: Rotterdam
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: MV GRAIN MASTER
Freight: USD 33/MT
Laycan: November 10-15
Demurrage: USD 10,000/day pro rata.

Thank you for your business!

Best regards,
Peter
